name: AWS Knowledge Base Retrieval
description: Retrieve information from AWS Knowledge Bases using Amazon Bedrock Agent Runtime. Query knowledge bases backed by various data sources for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) workflows with AWS services.

inputs.label: AWS Access Key ID
inputs.description: AWS Access Key ID for authenticating with AWS services. Must have permissions for Amazon Bedrock Agent Runtime.

obtain.instructions: Go to AWS Console > IAM > Users > Your User > Security credentials > Access keys. Create a new access key and note both the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key.

inputs.label: AWS Secret Access Key
inputs.description: AWS Secret Access Key paired with your Access Key ID.

inputs.label: AWS Region
inputs.description: AWS region where your Knowledge Base is deployed (e.g., us-east-1, us-west-2).

auth.instructions: Requires AWS credentials (Access Key ID, Secret Access Key) with permissions for Amazon Bedrock Agent Runtime. Configure an IAM user with appropriate Bedrock policies.

prerequisites: Configured Knowledge Base in Amazon Bedrock
